samples.input: Who created the R programming language?

messages.content: Who created the R programming language?

content.text: R was created by Ross Ihaka and Robert Gentleman at the University of Auckland, New Zealand in the early 1990s. It's named after the first letter of both creators' first names ("R"oss and "R"obert). R was inspired by the S programming language developed at Bell Laboratories and has since evolved through the contributions of many developers as an open-source project managed by the R Core Team.

R was created by Ross Ihaka and Robert Gentleman at the University of Auckland, New Zealand in the early 1990s. It's named after the first letter of both creators' first names ("R"oss and "R"obert). R was inspired by the S programming language developed at Bell Laboratories and has since evolved through the contributions of many developers as an open-source project managed by the R Core Team.

samples.input: In what year was version 1.0 of R released?

messages.content: In what year was version 1.0 of R released?

content.text: R version 1.0.0 was released on February 29, 2000. This marked the first stable release of R after its initial development began in the 1990s by Ross Ihaka and Robert Gentleman at the University of Auckland, New Zealand.

R version 1.0.0 was released on February 29, 2000. This marked the first stable release of R after its initial development began in the 1990s by Ross Ihaka and Robert Gentleman at the University of Auckland, New Zealand.
